body.p: The text of the unaccompanied Interpretation, IFRIC 1, is contained in Part A of this edition. Its effective date when issued was 1 September 2004. The text of the Basis for Conclusions on IFRIC 1 is contained in Part C of this edition. This part presents the following documents:

ol.li:
ILLUSTRATIVE EXAMPLES
Example 1: Cost model
Example 2: Revaluation model
Example 3: Transition
